FuncDef: This command sets the maximum PPP sessions that can be opened for a given MAC address.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum PPP sessions that can be opened for the given MAC address. Values-1 to 8191.
Enables support for IPv4 address allocation using the internal DCHCPv4 client for multiple PPPoE sessions on a single SAP that have the same MAC address and circuit ID.
